trans-unit.source: Number of pixels in one scan line of the bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Number of pixels in one scan line of the bitmap

target.mrk: Number of pixels in one scan line of the bitmap

trans-unit.source: Number of scan lines in the bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Number of scan lines in the bitmap

target.mrk: Number of scan lines in the bitmap

trans-unit.source: Offset, in bytes, between consecutive scan lines of the bitmap.

seg-source.mrk: Offset, in bytes, between consecutive scan lines of the bitmap.

target.mrk: Offset, in bytes, between consecutive scan lines of the bitmap.

trans-unit.source: If the stride is positive, the bitmap is top-down.

seg-source.mrk: If the stride is positive, the bitmap is top-down.

target.mrk: If the stride is positive, the bitmap is top-down.

trans-unit.source: If the stride is negative, the bitmap is bottom-up.

seg-source.mrk: If the stride is negative, the bitmap is bottom-up.

target.mrk: If the stride is negative, the bitmap is bottom-up.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the pixel format of the bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the pixel format of the bitmap

target.mrk: Specifies the pixel format of the bitmap

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the first (index 0) scan line of the bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to the first (index 0) scan line of the bitmap

target.mrk: Pointer to the first (index 0) scan line of the bitmap
